data.title: Aavante Bar 900
data.desc: What is better than watching your favourite movie at the theatre? Watching it from the comfort of your home with a theatre-like experience. Let Aavante Bar 900 elevate your senses with its 2.0 Channel Surround Sound. Its 30W RMS power will ensure you don’t miss the theatre experience while indulging in your entertainment. Combined with boAt Signature Sound, your everyday watching experience will hit the roof. With multiple connectivity options & EQ Modes, adjust your entertainment as per your mood & vibe. This effortlessly beautiful & sleek bluetooth soundbar comes with easy access integrated controls which makes life easier. Choose Aavante Bar 900 & #BringYourHomeToLife.

data.title: Aavante Bar 1160
data.desc: Become the life of every party with Stone 500. Experience 10W RMS stereo sound and groove with your gang on your favourite tunes. Double the thump with its TWS functionality that lets you connect & play 2 Stone 500 together. The dynamic RGB lights will add to the vibe of your party as you get transported to a club setting. Its universal connectivity with multiple connectivity modes —Bluetooth v5.0, AUX, USB and FM mode. With a Type-C charging interface & instant voice assistant, this wireless speaker will make your life easier as you enjoy the sound of your choice.  With Stone 500, it is time to #BeTheLimelight.

data.title: boAt Aavante Bar 1400
data.desc: Let your music transport you to your world with the Aavante Bar 1400 soundbar. Immerse in your favourite tunes with 120W RMS & boAt Signature Sound. Hit every beat as it drops with a 60W RMS subwoofer! Enjoy your favourite movie in crystal clear quality with the 2.1 Channel Surround Sound. The four different EQ Modes, including Movies, 3D, Music, & News, empower you to optimize your entertainment experience. Stay connected throughout with its Multiple Connectivity Modes ranging from AUX to Bluetooth 5.0. Not just this, the Aavante Bar 1400 is wall mountable too. So, sit back and control the modes with a master remote controller! Choose Aavante 1400 and bring your home to life

data.title: Aavante Bar 1300
data.desc: It is time for you to not just hear but feel the drop with Aavante Bar 1300. Let the boAt Signature Sound take you on a rollercoaster ride that only goes up with the immersive sound giving a thumping cinematic experience. With 60W RMS bring theatre like sound filling up the whole room, every corner, every nook. The multiple connectivity modes- USB, AUX, BT, and Optical HDMI(arc) make sure you listen to music or enjoy that first movie on the checklist at leisure. whether easy remote control access or seamless connectivity with Bluetooth v5.0, Aavante Bar 1300 has got it all! 2.0 Channel Sound is here to envelop you and take you to a parallel universe with its balanced sound and deep bass for an auditory experience like no other. Aavante Bar 1300 comes with Entertainment EQ modes – music, movies, news, and 3D and a sleek design with premium finish that will make you dance to the tunes while flaunting your moves and style!

data.title: Aavante Bar 1800
data.desc: Discover a new level of immersive, cinematic audio experience at home with the boAt AAVANTE Bar 1800. The 120W RMS BoAt Signature Sound with wireless subwoofer will make you groove uncontrollably, providing the extra bass for those extra moves! With 2.1 Channel Sound, surround yourself with music and feel the magic of cinema at home! The thrilling sound roars to life with unbelievable bass and power. Have Multiple Connectivity Modes and equal Entertainment EQ Modes to suit every mood that you feel. There is an air of sophistication about this soundbar. It makes the perfect style statement in any modern home with its sleek design and premium finish. With easy integrated controls and a master remote that does it all for you, bring comfort home.

data.title: boAt Aavante Bar 1750
data.desc: Make your movie nights 10X better with Aavante Bar 1750's theatre-like sound. Leave behind old ways of entertainment and immerse into a cinematic experience with the 120 Watt RMS boAt Signature Sound and 80W wireless subwoofer. Feel the thump of deep and thrilling bass and revolutionize how you listen to your entertainment. Its multiple EQ Modes is all you need to set the vibe right, including Jazz, Pop, Rock, and Classical. Don't move an inch to navigate through its multiple options with its Easy Access Remote. Revolutionize your entertainment with Aavante Bar 1750.

data.title: Aavante Bar 1550
data.desc: Not a fan of big and bulky speakers? Well, then bring home this 2.1-channel soundbar from boAt and indulge in an audio experience like never before. Featuring a stunning and sleek design, this boAt soundbar helps you connect devices to it via multiple connectivity modes so that you can enjoy your favourite audio content in a better and more immersive way.

data.title: Aavante Bar 1500
data.desc: Discover a new level of immersive, cinematic audio experience at home with the boAt Aavante Soundbar. With a powerful 120W total output, a slim soundbar and versatile 2-way subwoofer brings every aspect of your entertainment be it a song, show, or movie to life in the volume and clarity it deserves. Drivers at each end of your soundbar deliver a clear mid and high range, while a 60 W subwoofer fills in the rumbling lows. The 2.1 channel home theatre sound system provides a balanced sound and deep bass for your movies, music, and even video games and you can experience the cinematic sound that revolves around you. Stay plugged into the sound with an array of wired connections, and Bluetooth wireless technology. Bring your home to life with the Aavante Soundbar.

data.title: Aavante Bar 2000
data.desc: Wash away your stress with 2.1 Channel Surround Sound offered to you by boAt Aavante 2000. It is time to placates your soul and re-directs your energy to a better place. Rounded with 160 Watt RMS sound quality via 2.25-inch 4 premium dual drivers, experience true auditory bliss. The power-packed 80W, 6.5-inch driver unit in the wireless subwoofer accentuates the vibe and plugs you into what you need. Maximize your cinematic experiences and listening sessions with the Aavante 2000 bluetooth home theatre and call all your friends if the party gets too loud for just one person. Control your settings and operate the system with luxury via integrated controls and in-depth remote control. Just pick your best suited mode and let the party begin, as the Aavante 2000 is AUX, USB, OPTIC, HDMI (ARC), and Bluetooth compatible
